Package mx.uaemex.fi.isii.api_backend.services

Class RegisterService

java.lang.Object
mx.uaemex.fi.isii.api_backend.services.RegisterService
@Service public class RegisterService extends Object
Service. For managing attempts to insert a new register to the BD. Manage data validation Saves usuarios Saves empleados Gives utilities for the controller to create an Empleado

    • ValidateRegisterParams

      public Valid ValidateRegisterParams(String nombre, String apellidos, String rfc, String correo, Boolean isAdmin, String password)
      Used in the Controller.RegisterController for data validation. Validates each parameter.
      Returns:
      object Valid, if valid.getIsValidData() = true then the data is correct. If not, returns false and the error
